report_title: KJET Kirinyaga County Application Ranking and Evaluation

S1_Registration_Track_Record_5%.reason: Cooperative registered since 1995 (>3 years) with functioning governance (Score 5).

S2_Financial_Position_20%.reason: Turnover (>KES 22M in 2024) is >KES 10M with a positive 2-yr trend (Score 5).

S3_Market_Demand_Competitiveness_20%.reason: Active off-take contract (Brookside Dairy) and multi-channel sales (B2B/B2C) (Score 5).

S4_Business_Proposal_Viability_25%.reason: Clear problem/solution (capacity constraint/new cooler); highly quantified targets; detailed execution and co-investment readiness (Score 5).

S5_Value_Chain_Alignment_10%.reason: Priority VC (Dairy); fills critical aggregation/cooling node with strong upstream linkages (Score 5).

S6_Inclusivity_Sustainability_20%.reason: Strong women (35%) and youth (38%) participation. 2+ green practices (Solar power, waste heat recovery) (Score 5).

S1_Registration_Track_Record_5%.reason: SACCO registered since 1999 (>3 years) with functioning governance (Score 5).

S2_Financial_Position_20%.reason: Turnover (>KES 15M in 2024) is >KES 10M with a positive 2-yr trend (Score 5).

S3_Market_Demand_Competitiveness_20%.reason: Active off-taker/buyer (Kandongu Tea Factory) with clear, stable demand (Score 5).

S4_Business_Proposal_Viability_25%.reason: Strong plan to improve tea yield/quality, quantified targets, but budget is rough/high-level estimates (Score 4).

S5_Value_Chain_Alignment_10%.reason: Additional VC (Tea); fills critical aggregation/quality node with strong linkages (Score 5).

S6_Inclusivity_Sustainability_20%.reason: 50% women participation; PWD inclusion (3%); 2+ green practices (water/energy conservation advisory) (Score 5).

S1_Registration_Track_Record_5%.reason: Cooperative registered since 1990 (>3 years) with functioning governance (Score 5).

S2_Financial_Position_20%.reason: Turnover (KES 7.2M in 2024) is 5–<10M, with stable/growing trend (Score 4).

S3_Market_Demand_Competitiveness_20%.reason: Consistent orders from NCPB (primary customer); single-channel sales but stable demand (Score 4).

S4_Business_Proposal_Viability_25%.reason: Strong plan to expand paddy storage capacity; quantified targets present (Score 4).

S5_Value_Chain_Alignment_10%.reason: Additional VC (Rice); fills critical aggregation/storage node with strong linkages (Score 5).

S6_Inclusivity_Sustainability_20%.reason: Strong gender participation (45% women); 1-2 green practices (water harvesting for cleaning/processing) (Score 4).

S1_Registration_Track_Record_5%.reason: MSME Association, inferred 1-3 years of operation based on 2024 turnover spike (Score 4).

S2_Financial_Position_20%.reason: Turnover spike to KES 6.9M in 2024 (5–<10M), but KES 0 in prior years, suggesting stabilization/recovery (Score 4).

S3_Market_Demand_Competitiveness_20%.reason: Consistent sales (implied by 25 projects/month target); multiple services (structural, custom, repair) (Score 4).

S4_Business_Proposal_Viability_25%.reason: Clear objectives/targets; detailed execution plan (end-to-end service), but investment budget is general (Score 4).

S5_Value_Chain_Alignment_10%.reason: Priority VC (Construction/Welding); fills critical fabrication/installation node with documented linkages (Score 5).

S6_Inclusivity_Sustainability_20%.reason: Strong gender/youth participation (47% female members); 1-2 green practices (waste reduction goal, safety/efficiency focus) (Score 4).

ineligible_applicants.reason: No verifiable financial evidence. Bank Statements provided were corrupted/image-based and no text could be extracted.
